name: Kantary Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed 12 nights during october and found the setting of the hotel on one of the best beaches in the area to be just what we wanted.
reviews.title: good place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: for the money paid for the villa could not fault the place.good rooms fitted out to a decent standard with every thing you require.a nice large verandah to sit on early morning/evening with a cold beer listening to the waves breaking on the beach makes for a relaxing time.
reviews.title: Peaceful Haven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: food in the restaurant is of a decent standard and efficently run by the lovely staff.
reviews.title: Awesome Place, Awesome People! :-)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: do remember this is advertised as a family resort and it is exactly what it is so in the school holidays etc. i would imagine there would be a lot of children around the resort which might make it unsuitable for some.
reviews.title: Thank You Tu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 9 nights at the Kantary Beach late September and had a great stay. Had booked direct with hotel so free upgrade to Villa which was great. Staff were without exception friendly and helpful. Darren the guest relations manger was only in post a few weeks and was very helpful. I imagine by the height of season he will be a great source of information for those planning days out etc. We enjoyed the best food I think we have ever had on holiday and we have stayed in some nice hotels in Asia. Mr Tu restaurant was a gem, attentive and helpful. Having had a few unexpected surprises with the spiciness of Thai food in the past I always check how hot something is now and he was great for that and the kitchen was able to tone it down if you wanted. We had a fabulous holiday and will definitely be back.
reviews.title: Superb Staff in an Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just come back from a weeks stay at the kantary beach hotel. I would say as a hotelier myself, that this is a good value resort, on a beautiful stretch of beach - which really is beautiful.
reviews.title: A new resort in Khao Lak ... needs to work on the ambience in the resort ..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011
reviews.text: First impressions, we were really disappointed on arrival to see a major construction, crane etc and new hotel being developed right next to the kantary beach, so our arrival at reception was probably a little disappointed - however, once you get into the resort, there really is very little noise, unless, you are in the bedrooms near reception.
reviews.title: The perfect choice whatever you want

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were transfered by golf cart to a villa one block back from the beach - and the accommodation I have to say was really faultless - and soon forgot about the construction site next door. The rooms were really excellent, lovely linen, well designed, impeccable housekeeping team. I thought the standard of the accommodation was really excellent and good value.
reviews.title: Tropical Getaway at its Best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast at the hotel each morning was really great good quality and lots of choice and very attentive service from the very large team.
reviews.title: Khao Lak

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The things I felt really the resort really needs to work on, is the overall ambience in the hotel i the evening.
reviews.title: A great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from our honeymoon,12 nights in the Kantary khao Lak and we were not disappointed!
reviews.title: Honeymoon paradise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: VILLA AND GENERAL HOTEL
reviews.title: Book it- Go on- enjoy a get away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked a villa, but on arriving discovered it wasn't close to the beach so upgraded once we were there to a beach side villa. The accomodation is overall very good value for money, costing about £50 a night for the villas nearest the beach, and about £33 a night for those more inland. The rooms were very luxorious, a high standard, with an outdoor shower which was a lovely touch. We could hear the sea from our Villa, and only had to walk 20m to the beach, it was really lovely.
reviews.title: Want to return with the rest of our family

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: August in Thailand, we discovered is low season, and the hotel was probably only at 20% capacity, which was great. There were no problems getting seats at breakfast, or any other meal and the staff were very attentive, if not even bored - they were dying to get you drinks/food or anything you needed. The beach looked deserted, it really was a paradise beach ande quite often we were the only people on the beach, with other tourists preferring the swimming pool.
reviews.title: I love this paradise...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The beach is absolutely stunning! Its picture-postcard perfect. The sea is warm, clean and beautiful. When we were there the sea was quite wavy so not ideal for snorkeling, although I'm not sure whether the sea is calmer when it is not monsoon season in which case it would be more suitable for snorkeling. It seems safe for children as the currents don't seem too strong. You can also hire a canoe, kayak or sailboat from the hotel very cheaply. We hired a canoe for one hour for 80 baht (approx £1.50).
reviews.title: Brilliant staff, brilliant hotel, we will return!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a wonderful 9 nights at Kantary Beach.
reviews.title: Thai Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This is a 4 star hotel but I would give it 5 - and believe me I am fussy.
reviews.title: Long Beach, Good Service and Great Price ^_^.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in a villa (one back from the beach) it was wonderful. It has a huge bedroom with comfy bed and pillows. Outside shower is a rare treat, and great sitting area.
reviews.title: Wonderfull Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are all very friendly from Darren in hotel guest relations, all the girls in the dining room especially Sujittra, Eiaw and Keerati, who made our last night special by giving us a lantern to set off over the sea - really appreciated and I was quite touched by it.
reviews.title: Paradise without the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I also have to mention Mr Tu (restraunt manager) who went out his way to make sure we had everything we needed and got the chef to make us thia meals which he recommended (not always on the menu). All reviews about him are spot on - he is a genuine gentleman.
reviews.title: Lovely place

description: Located on one of the few remaining stretches of pristine beach in Phang Nga, just north of Phuket, the Kantary Beach is simply breathtaking. Comprised of elegant and modern suites and serene and private bungalows, the hotel fronts a stunning beach and is surrounded by lush, tropical foliage, two relaxing lakes and the hills of Phang Nga.
